item.title: CV - Mehul Irá
item.description: Curriculum Vitae Personal information Full name: Mehul Sasikante Irá E-mail: mehulira@protonmail.com Work Experience Software Enginner at Mindera Since January 2022. Currently here. Technologies: Java, Spring Framework and Elasticsearch. Software Enginner at Sky Technology Centre - Portugal From May 2021 to December 2021. Technologies: Kotlin, Spring Framework, Spring Boot and Couchbase. Software Enginner at Mindera From August 2015 to May 2021. Worked with several tech partners and/or clients, as a Software Developer, helping them build backend solutions for the Retail, Gambling, Gaming and SaaS business sectors.

item.title: Digging into Goroutines I
item.description: Go enables writing programs with concurrent threads of execution. And it does so by introducing the concept of goroutine. A goroutine has a simple model: it is a function executing concurrently with other goroutines in the same address space. in Effective Go Before digging into goroutines, having an understanding on “how” the Go compiler and runtime work together in order to launch a goroutine will pave the path to its internals.

item.title: About Me
